template.name: Scita Header All Category For Mobile

t.t-nocache: Each user is different regardless of the page visited.
The number of products is dynamic, this rendering cannot be cached.

t.t-value: request.session['website_sale_cart_quantity'] if 'website_sale_cart_quantity' in request.session else request.cart.cart_quantity or 0

button.class: nav-toggle-btn account_icon btn p-0 rounded-circle position-relative

sup.t-attf-class: my_cart_quantity badge position-absolute top-0 end-0 mt-n1 me-n1 rounded-pill bg-primary #{_badge_class} #{'d-none' if (website_sale_cart_quantity == 0) else ''}

t.t-nocache: The number of products in compare is dynamic, this rendering cannot be cached.

a.class: nav-toggle-btn compare_link btn p-0 rounded-circle position-relative

sup.class: compare_quantity badge position-absolute top-0 end-0 mt-n1 me-n1 rounded-pill bg-primary d-none

t.t-valuef: btn d-flex align-items-center rounded-circle p-1 pe-3 text-reset o_navlink_background
btn d-flex align-items-center rounded-circle p-1 pe-3 text-reset o_navlink_background

div.p: Buy one get one free on first order

t.t-valuef: btn d-flex align-items-center rounded-circle p-1 pe-3 text-reset o_navlink_background

t.t-value: 'top-link-compare o_navlink_background_hover btn position-relative rounded-pill p-1 text-reset'
'top-link-checkout o_navlink_background_hover btn position-relative rounded-pill p-1 text-reset'

t.t-valuef: btn d-flex align-items-center rounded-circle p-1 pe-3 text-reset o_navlink_background
btn d-flex align-items-center rounded-circle p-1 pe-3 text-reset o_navlink_background

input.t-att-value: int(line.product_uom_qty) == line.product_uom_qty and int(line.product_uom_qty) or line.product_uom_qty

div.p: Looks like you havent added anything to your cart yet.

span.t-if: line.product_id and line.product_id.product_tmpl_id and not line.product_id.product_tmpl_id.image_512
